sentences.en: "This is Malcolm," the girl said awkwardly, to fill the silence.
sentences.cn: 女孩尴尬地说了句“这是马尔科姆”，打破了沉默。

sentences.en: A girl may fill out before she reaches her full height.
sentences.cn: 女孩子在长足个头之前可能会发胖。

sentences.en: an understudy who filled in at the last minute.
sentences.cn: 在最后一分钟才临时替补的演员

sentences.en: Can you fill in some of the details of your career?
sentences.cn: 能不能把你的工作经历填得详细一点？

sentences.en: carefully filled out the job application.
sentences.cn: 仔细填写工作申请

sentences.en: Fill a bowl with water and gently sponge your face and body.
sentences.cn: 在一只盆里放上水，轻轻地用蘸湿的海绵擦拭你的面部及身体。

sentences.en: Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a slow boil.
sentences.cn: 往平底锅里加满水，小火煮沸。

sentences.en: Fill in any cracks before starting to paint.
sentences.cn: 先把裂缝填塞好再开始粉刷。

sentences.en: Fill in gaps by using short, upward strokes of the pencil.
sentences.cn: 用铅笔向上短短地勾画几道来填充空白。

sentences.en: Fill out the application carefully, and keep copies of it.
sentences.cn: 仔细填写申请表，并且保存副本。

sentences.en: Fill small holes with wood filler in a matching colour.
sentences.cn: 用颜色相配的木质填料填平小孔。

sentences.en: fill your boots with spicy Szechuan food for under five bucks a plate.
sentences.cn: 每盘不足五美元的麻辣四川菜，请敞开肚子吃吧。

sentences.en: fill your boots with spicy Szechuan food for under five bucks a plate.
sentences.cn: 每盘不足五美元的麻辣四川菜，请敞开肚子吃吧。

sentences.en: He filled out after age 35.
sentences.cn: 35岁之后他变胖了

sentences.en: He poured her a drink, then filled his own glass.
sentences.cn: 他给她倒了一杯，然后将自己的杯子斟满。

sentences.en: I filled in a chap and took his money.
sentences.cn: 我揍了一个家伙，拿走了他的钱。

sentences.en: I patiently &B{filled} him &B{in on} the British tradition of sherry tippling.
sentences.cn: 我耐心细致地给他讲述了英国人畅饮雪利酒的传统。

sentences.en: I wasn't there—would you fill me in?
sentences.cn: 我不在那里——你能告诉我那的消息吗

sentences.en: Kemp got out of his car. "Just fill her up, thanks."
sentences.cn: 肯普下了车。“给它加满油，谢谢。”

sentences.en: Miller’s band was filling dance halls (= attracting a lot of people ) all over the country.
sentences.cn: 米勒的乐队在全国各地的舞厅都人气爆棚。

sentences.en: My job was filling the flour sacks.
sentences.cn: 我的工作是装面粉袋。

sentences.en: Nadja had to fill out forms surrendering all rights to her property.
sentences.cn: 纳佳不得不填表放弃其全部财产所有权。

sentences.en: No one has been able to fill his shoes.
sentences.cn: 目前还没人能接替他的位置。

sentences.en: Numerous pictures fill every available space.
sentences.cn: 密密麻麻的照片填满了每一块空处。

sentences.en: Pass me your cup, Amy, and I'll fill it up for you.
sentences.cn: 把杯子递给我，埃米，我给你加满。

sentences.en: Take a deep breath and allow your lungs to fill.
sentences.cn: 深吸一口气，让肺部涨满。

sentences.en: the canal is now disused and partly filled in.
sentences.cn: 这条运河现在废弃不用，已经部分堵塞了。

sentences.en: The dentist commenced to dig, drill and finally fill the offending tooth.
sentences.cn: 牙医开始在那颗有问题的牙齿上挖洞，钻孔，直到最后把它补好。

sentences.en: the dining car filled up.
sentences.cn: 餐车已经客满了。

sentences.en: There was just enough wind to fill the sails.
sentences.cn: 正好有足够大的风鼓满船帆。

sentences.en: Volunteers fill a real need for teachers in the Somali Republic.
sentences.cn: 志愿者满足了索马里共和国对教师的迫切需求。

sentences.en: With a lip pencil, outline lips and fill them in.
sentences.cn: 用唇线笔勾出双唇的轮廓，然后涂上唇膏。

sentences.en: Women fill 35% of senior management positions.
sentences.cn: 女性担任35%的高级管理职位。

sentences.en: You don't need green fingers to fill your home with lush leaves.
sentences.cn: 不是园艺大师也可以把自己的家里装点得绿意盎然。

words.tran_cn: （杂志等的）补白；装填者；装填物；充填器

phrases.tran_cn: 取代某人的职位或责任
暂代：担任替补；临时替补
长胖：变得或使变得更胖
(非正式)接替并胜任某人的职位（或职责）

trans.tran_cn: 装满，占满，使遍及，充满，满足，担任，消磨时间，使吃饱，供货
trans.tran_en: if a container or place fills, or if you fill it, enough of something goes into it to make it full
if a container or place fills, or if you fill it, enough of something goes into it to make it full

trans.tran_cn: 装满，布满；以…充注，填塞；满足；充任，担任
trans.tran_en: if a container or place fills, or if you fill it, enough of something goes into it to make it full
